name: Sorting System
description:
How many packages can you sort without screwing up?

How to play: Drag the boxes to the correct colour or else you'll lose one of your 3 lives.

Controls: Left mouse button does almost everything,

Press Escape to return to the main menu.

There's only 2 types of boxes so it's extremely simple but it's easy to mess up if you're not careful. I might add more stuff in the future like more boxes and features but only if people want me to.

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you are having difficulty picking up the boxes go into the options and enable:

"Big Boxes"

If anybody wants me to I'll make the game open-source

---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------

If you encounter any bugs please tell me.
